content: this pattern is for a lovely hat and handwarmers i will be knitting these as gifts for friends and family this year a matching scarf is also available it is such a lovely stitch pattern to knit as it is easy but still interesting - and it grows well requires dk yarn 60g for both hat and handwarmers if you are using acrylic dk and 4mm needles happy knitting **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
